text: IRM 10.8.40 is obsolete. This obsoletes all versions of IRM 10.8.40.
All controls from this IRM are obsolete. The following controls that remain effective have been merged into IRM
Information Technology (IT) Security - Government Furnished and Personally Owned Mobile Device Security Policy and IRM
Information Technology (IT) Security - Network Security Policy, or are already addressed in another IRM (and are still there) as speciﬁed.

All controls from this IRM are obsolete. The following controls that remain effective have been merged into IRM 10.8.26 Information Technology (IT) Security - Government Furnished and Personally Owned Mobile Device Security Policy and IRM 10.8.55 Information Technology (IT) Security - Network Security Policy, or are already addressed in another IRM (and are still there) as

10.8.40.3.14.2.2 Bluetooth Pairing and Authentication: The material related to this section is Bluetooth controls have been relocated to IRM 10.8.26. As a result of the Sunsetting of DoD reference, the source of the controls requirements have been changed and are based on NIST 800-121 Revision 2 documentation.

As a result of the Sunsetting of DoD reference, the source of the controls requirements have been changed and are based on NIST 800-121 Revision 2 documentation.
